plot: Tommy discovers the extent of the mission given to him and the extreme lengths his new paymasters are willing to go to in their quest for power. Meanwhile his own family's activities lead to escalating danger in Birmingham.

Tommy is approached by a priest, Father Hughes, an agent for a group of establishment types anxious to prevent a communist revolution in the country, leading to a meeting with Tatiana's uncle, Grand Duke Petrovna, to discuss the arms deal. Meanwhile Vicente Changretta, leader of a rival Italian gang, suggests a truce, which the headstrong John Shelby, to Polly's anger, rejects. As a result there is a renewal of a violent turf war, culminating at Tommy's evening in aid of his charitable foundation.—don @ minifie-1
